segments.text: I notice the kitchen layout, with cabinets on one side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is facing away, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing now, onto the floor below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on a stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool leans back a bit, unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl watches him, arm extended upward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight comes through the window, brightening the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside has neat bushes and a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are piled neatly on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one seems to notice the water or the wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an ordinary day turning unusual.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The apron on the woman adds a homey touch.
segments.speaker: PAR
